testcase.name: Confirm user can save homepage form data.
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in and on homepage.....................................passed When subscriber inputs 'United States' '122 Main St.' 'mcarway@gmail.com' and '888-999-0987' in all address fields.passed And user clicks save button.................................................passed Then the saved message appears..............................................passed

testcase.name: Confirm all page elements appear as expected
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed Then user should see test project logo......................................passed And user should see bold title and introductory paragraph...................passed And user should see free sign up button.....................................passed And user should see watch demos label.......................................passed And user should see web button..............................................passed And user should see mobile button...........................................passed And user should see bold title in login form................................passed And user should see description text in login form..........................passed And user should see password hint text in login form........................passed And user should see try test project label in footer........................passed And user should see support email address in footer.........................passed And user should see twitter link in footer..................................passed And user should see facebook link in footer.................................passed And user should see free signup button in footer............................passed

testcase.name: Confirm top signup button sends user to signup page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user clicks top signup button..........................................passed Then user lands on signup page..............................................passed

testcase.name: Confirm footer signup button sends user to signup page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user clicks footer signup button.......................................passed Then user lands on signup page..............................................passed
